feed.title: La Grande Rivière - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande Rivière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 1:46 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -24.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -28.2°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
